• Home

    • svn add - excluding the files directory

    Tags: drupal regular expressions svn
    I use bash script that I found on GotDrupal for adding and removing files from svn using a regular expression. I normally use the command for simple tasks, like the ones shown in the video on GotDrupal, but today I used a regular expression that took me a few minutes to get working. I wanted to add everything in my local development environment to the svn repository except for the files directory. The first thing I did was add my Drupal install non recursively, then with my handy svngrep command added the rest of the directories, except for the files directory. svn add -N drupal cd drupal svngrep '^\?.*[^( files$)].*$' add
